prompts.name: Technology Strategy Development
prompts.description: This template serves as a guide for drawing up a technology strategy. Replace {{business objectives}} with your company's goals, {{technology goals}} with your desired outcomes regarding technology use, and {{implementation plan}} with the steps for executing the strategy.
prompts.content: Outline a technology strategy that maps to {{business objectives}}. Detail your {{technology goals}}, emphasising how they will drive business growth. Propose an {{implementation plan}} that ensures the smooth rollout of new technologies. Exclude proprietary information that should not be shared extensively.

prompts.name: Software Procurement Document
prompts.description: Use this template to prepare a comprehensive software procurement document. Substitute {{software requirements}} with your list of needs, {{vendor evaluation criteria}} with the aspects you'll consider when choosing a vendor, and {{implementation timeline}} with the plan for software integration.
prompts.content: Draft a software procurement document specifying the {{software requirements}}. Detail the {{vendor evaluation criteria}} for transparent supplier selection. Finally, provide an {{implementation timeline}} to ensure clarity on rollout expectations. Do not include sensitive financial details until final vendor negotiations.

prompts.name: IT Vendor Selection
prompts.description: This template is for framing an IT vendor selection process. Replace {{key criteria}} with your deciding factors, {{potential vendors}} with the list of suppliers able to meet your needs, and {{selection timeline}} with the timeframe for vendor selection.
prompts.content: Develop an IT vendor selection plan for our upcoming project. Define {{key criteria}} for evaluation, enumerate promising {{potential vendors}}, and provide a {{selection timeline}} that covers vetting, negotiation, and decision-making. Be mindful to maintain confidentiality around proprietary selection criteria.

prompts.name: IT Risk Assessment Report
prompts.description: This template aids in creating an IT risk assessment report. Substitute {{assessed areas}} with the IT sections evaluated, {{identified risks}} with risks spotted during assessment, and {{risk mitigation strategies}} with your plans to manage these risks.
prompts.content: Carry out an IT risk assessment, covering {{assessed areas}} A thorough report should detail {{identified risks}} and recommend corresponding {{risk mitigation strategies}}. Remember to keep the language clear and avoid speculation or prediction without concrete data.

prompts.name: Data Governance Policy
prompts.description: Use this template to construct a data governance policy. Replace {{policy objectives}} with the goals of your data governance, {{procedures and standards}} with your chosen rules and benchmarks, and {{roles and responsibilities}} with the teams or individuals accountable for data governance.
prompts.content: Outline a comprehensive data governance policy. Enumerate {{policy objectives}}, establish {{procedures and standards}} for data management, and assign {{roles and responsibilities}} accordingly. Be sure to maintain data confidentiality and follow all regulatory compliance guidelines.

prompts.name: Cybersecurity Plan
prompts.description: This template is for formulating a robust cybersecurity plan. Replace {{cyber threats}} with identified digital security risks, {{security measures}} with your proposed precautions, and {{incident response plan}} with your strategy for reacting to breaches.
prompts.content: Draft a concrete cybersecurity plan. Identify potential {{cyber threats}}, suggest go-to {{security measures}}, and develop an {{incident response plan}} for unforeseen security breaches. Avoid disclosing sensitive company information or precise technical details that could be exploited.

prompts.name: Cloud Migration Strategy
prompts.description: This template helps create a detailed cloud migration strategy. Substitute {{selected cloud platforms}} with your chosen providers, {{migration phases}} with the stages of your migration plan, and {{post-migration actions}} with your plan for post-migration activities, such as crew training or system optimisation.
prompts.content: Assemble a cloud migration strategy. Consider which {{selected cloud platforms}} will best suit our needs, delineate the {{migration phases}}, and plan for {{post-migration actions}}. Continue employing best practices for data security and privacy throughout.

prompts.name: Technology Partnerships Proposal
prompts.description: Use this template to devise a proposal for technology partnerships. Replace {{potential partners}} with the companies you're considering for partnerships, {{partnership benefits}} with what each party stands to gain, and {{collaboration plan}} with a high-level strategy for the partnership.
prompts.content: Draft a proposal for establishing technology partnerships with {{potential partners}}. Highlight mutual {{partnership benefits}} and outline a {{collaboration plan}} which aligns with our overall technology strategy. Remember to respect non-disclosure agreements and proprietary information.

prompts.name: Innovation Roadmap
prompts.description: This template is for developing an innovation roadmap. Substitute {{innovation goals}} with what you hope to achieve through innovation, {{key milestones}} with major steps on the journey, and {{resources required}} with the people, tools, and funding your goals will need.
prompts.content: Plan a detailed innovation roadmap. Start with our broad {{innovation goals}}, chart {{key milestones}} towards accomplishing them, and enumerate the {{resources required}}. Steer clear of mentioning unapproved initiatives or unsecured resources.

prompts.name: AI Integration Plan
prompts.description: This template aids in formulating an AI integration plan. Replace {{AI applications}} with the specific purposes you intend to use AI in your business, {{implementation stages}} with the phases for deploying AI, and {{expected benefits}} with the positive outcomes you forecast from AI integration.
prompts.content: Draw up an AI integration plan that covers desired {{AI applications}}, the {{implementation stages}}, and potential challenges that may arise. Additionally, explore the {{expected benefits}} and the impacts on various business areas. Avoid revealing sensitive internal strategies or unapproved plans.

prompts.name: Digital Transformation Blueprint
prompts.description: Use this template to create a blueprint for a digital transformation journey. Replace {{transformation goals}} with your objectives for digitalisation, {{technology adoption plan}} with your strategy for implementing new technologies, and {{impact assessment}} with projections of how the transformation will benefit your business.
prompts.content: Draft a digital transformation blueprint that outlines {{transformation goals}}, details the {{technology adoption plan}}, and predicts potential results through an {{impact assessment}}. Ensure the blueprint aligns with the company's strategic goals and operational capabilities. Omit confidential or proprietary details pertaining to future transformation efforts.
